31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_MOUNT_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_MOUNT_H_
33
34#include_next <sys/mount.h>
35
36#define MS_OVERLAY 0
37#define MS_RDONLY MNT_RDONLY
38#define MS_FORCE MNT_FORCE
39#define MS_REMOUNT MNT_UPDATE
40#define MS_OPTIONSTR __MNT_UNUSED1
41#define MS_NOMNTTAB 0 /* We don't have any mnttab anyway. */
42
43typedef struct fid fid_t;
44
45#define mount(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h) zmount(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h)
46
47struct zfs_args {
48 char fspec[MAXNAMELEN - 1];
49 char dataptr[MAXPATHLEN];
50 char optptr[MAXPATHLEN];
51 char *fstype;
52 int mflag;
53 int datalen;
54 int optlen;
55 int flags;
56};
57
58typedef struct zfs_args zfs_args_t;
59
60int
61zmount(const char *spec, const char *dir, int mflag, char *fstype,
62 char *dataptr, int datalen, char *optptr, int optlen);
63
64int
65umount2(const char *spec, int mflag);
66
67#define vfs_fstype mnt_op->vfs_name
68
69#endif /* !_OPENSOLARIS_SYS_MOUNT_H_ */
70
